content: this legal case involves a dispute over a property called ston which was divided and sold through a public auction the court has determined the market value of the property and each coowners share after a legal process lasting 6 years and 2 months a final resolution has been reached the court has ordered the counterparty to reimburse the petitioners costs but rejected their request for a larger amount the court expert provided documentation on the propertys condition and concluded that it could be divided the court decided to hold a public auction and distribute the proceeds proportionally among the coowners the court rejected objections raised by the counterparty and confirmed the decision
